means: 嫁妆，天赋，从亡夫处得来的用以维持生活的财产
给以用以维持生活的财产，给以嫁妆

sentence.Network_en: She was drinking all day by the dower.
sentence.Network_cn: 她用从亡夫处得来的产业整天喝酒.

sentence.Network_en: The dower of the woman is very much.
Let her beauty be her wedding dower, for me and my possessions she esteems not.
sentence.Network_cn: 就让她的美貌当她的嫁妆吧; 因为她瞧不起我和我的财产.

因为他有一种不同寻常的教师天资(gift),它是一种自然的天赋(dower),正如有的人拿铅笔,而有的人是小提琴的弓。” 靠谱译文:贾思托暗示但没明说:“如果运气好.

list.abs: a writ of right of dower whereof the ., 分之一的房地产的权利状.
what in the least will you require in present dower with her ., 你希望她至少要有多少的嫁妆.
doubling up倍增保额弥补法dower interest寡妇利益draft authority票据代理权
The dower of the woman is very much ., 那个妇女的嫁妆很多.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French douaire, from medieval Latin dotarium, from Latin dotare 'endow', from dos, dot- 'dowry'; related to dare 'give'

means.word_mean: 1. money or property brought by a woman to her husband at marriage
2. a life estate to which a wife is entitled on the death of her husband

sentences.sentence: "When she got married, she got dowered"

auth_sentence.content: Dower'd with our curse, and stranger'd with our oath.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dower'd with our curse, and stranger'd with our oath.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dower'd with our curse, and stranger'd with our oath.
